movie_title: Four charged over money laundering scheme via cash withdrawals from Sheng Siong teller machines
introduction: Authorities have uncovered a new money laundering scheme involving the illegal withdrawal of cash fr

vocabulary.definition: the illegal process of making large amounts of money obtained illegally, such as through criminal activities, appear to have been earned legitimately
vocabulary.example: The authorities arrested several individuals involved in a complex money laundering operation.
The investigation uncovered evidence of fraud within the company.

vocabulary.definition: exposed to danger, suspicion, or disrepute
vocabulary.example: The compromised data led to a security breach in the system.

vocabulary.definition: an instance of buying or selling something; a business deal
vocabulary.example: She completed the online transaction for the purchase of a new laptop.

vocabulary.definition: to mark or identify something as unusual, suspicious, or in need of attention
vocabulary.example: The system is designed to flag out any unusual account activity for further investigation.

vocabulary.definition: observing and checking the progress or quality of something over a period of time; keeping a continuous watch on something
vocabulary.example: The security team is responsible for monitoring the network for any unauthorized access attempts.
